content.detailedDescription:
I was lying on my bed looking out of my bedroom window through my x25 telescope when the object came into view, i kept it in view calling to my parents, still awake in the adjoining bedroom, to come and see what i was looking at.  my father came first, looked out of the window, and grabbed the telescope.  "what the hell is that ?" he said.  i answered " it���s a flying saucer, we���ve just been discussing them in school".  my mother then came in to my bedroom and only had time to see it, still flying a fairly slow course due south, nearly at the horizon. when it had gone we all discussed what we had seen, viz. a green oval, slightly narrower at the front, flying very steadily directly south for about 30 or 40 seconds. dad and i, who had seen it through the ���scope, thought it might have had a slightly brighter rim with a slightly yellow tinge to it.
we looked in the papers the next day to see if anyone else had seen it, and found one report of an extremely similar object seen in brighton, sussex, directly south of london, seen the evening before, about 2 hours after we had seen "our" ufo.
since then, in the words of the song, "i���m a believer" !!!
your points 1. i, 14 years old, was interested in astronomy and regularly before sleeping had a look out of my bedroom window, and if it was a clear night, i���d get my telescope out and look up at the stars.
2. it "flew" into the bottom of my view throught the telescope
3. i was excited, not sure but hoping it was a ufo as we had just talked about this in my class at school.
4. above  5. still excited, and glad my parents had seen it too.
6. it flew over the southern horizon, never deviating from its steady courle sout.
content.summary: Glowing green flying straight over me from north to south

content.detailedDescription:
This is the third time i have seen this same object!
   this night it was 8:35 pm when i saw it was there. it twinkles to the naked eye but when seen thru binonculars it is similar to looking at a ferris wheel from the side veiw with the lights going ..Twinkling & blinking. i also seems to move...Possibly rotate because it also can be veiwed as a elongated shape...Then it comes back into the sphere shape. lights are white ...Red & possibly blue or green...The object stayed in view until 9;10 pm when it seemed to fade somewhat but then was just gone...Even when i checked with the binoculars. 
    my husband & son also wee out when this was spotted & both also saw it with & without binoculars. 
    i also was speaking with a friend who lives about 7 miles from me. she , her husband & their son also verifeied what i was seeing. they saw it & described it to me as the very same object i was seeing.
    the next morning i talked with judy from mufon.
content.summary: Sphere shaped with lights in western sky ..3rd time now

content.detailedDescription:
we've had many sightings this year alone...Most from a distance, some very close,already made reports on those earlier,in the spring.Still have alot of activity around here, my 1st report was put in mufon's "filers files" newsletter.
  we have these things that look like stars w/red,blue, & white flickering colors...Finally  saw one close enough that through the binoculars , it looked like a simon game.You could see 4 quadrants on bottom,each w/it's own series of white lights in it , & simultaneously red, green,blue,would light up one full 1/4.It would change horizontally,vertically,then 1,2,3,4 clockwise..It was awesome to see,& for me to see it w/naked eyes & through binocs.,i figure it couldn't have been too far away.(3 knuckles from horizon.)didn't move,make noise,etc.,just disappeared after 3am sometime.No clouds,clear sky,just gone. 
  
 also,while on a camping trip to tippasaw lake, this summer,took a picture of my son on the beach,slightly overcast day, no planes around...But when we got home & put pics. on comp.,saw something behind him.Will try to attach pic.You decide,it wasn't there to my naked eye,though,i'm always taking pics. & watching the sky,it wasn't there!)
 and tonight there's more than usual ,we counted 8 just in the northern horizon areas.No planes either,which is weird for this time of night,usually see 1 every 15min. or so over there.The ones(2 ea.) in the n.Nw. & n.Ne.,are at 4 knuckles from the horizon.The one due north is up higher @ 7 knuckles(kindof forming a gigantic triangle that covers the entire northern sky view). and 3 more above the center one about 1-2 more knuckles . 
  wish someone could fill us all in on what the heck is going on 'round here,seems like a mass wave of sightings world wide,in my opinion.Still waiting on the investigators to show up & get'em.;)or at least ,explain them.
i'll keep watching the harrison co. skies, until then.:)
content.summary: When is someone going to explain this?

content.detailedDescription: I was siting on my back porch on the phone and we have a subdivision behind us i was already looking back there while i was talking and the house about 80 feet away like 20 feet above the roof i saw a bright light i first i thought plane but no noise and it was fast if it was something man made i figured i would hear it there was no sound at all oddly i was not weird ed out like it was a every day thing dont know it that is important but that how i felt but any way it just zoomed by flashing a very bright light just around the object like it was a ball of white flame like a very bright glow then like it realized i was looking at it it stopped flashing went dark and flew straight up like automatically i saw a shimmer of what i thought was metal and went straight up well thats that
content.summary: Cool

content.detailedDescription: I was out at the lake here in winslow with a female friend and i lit up a cigarette and look up and saw this triangle shaped very dark object that was low enough for me to see it but it had no lights and made a humming sound or something like it.This thing was huge to say the least and it blocked oput the stars and was very visable even though it was dark i watched this thing for about 30 mins. my female friend saw this object and freaked as i only stood in stunned silence.
content.summary: Dark object that was darker then the night sky

content.detailedDescription:
Was at my brothers house he had called me over he said that the lights were out in the sky, so i wemt over there and there where lights with red green or blue and white lights flashing from the north, east, west, and south. so my brother got out his big flashlight  and flashed it off and on the object to the east went crazy you could see all the lights flicker has if it was going crazy.My sister-in-law and i was getting a little scared cause the light would move more light when my brother fladed his ligths off and on
i wish somone would take us seriously we have seen flashing lights in the skys that dont move until they are ready.Something is going on in this area my brother and sister-in -law and neice  and me have been checking these lights out for over a month they are always to the north,south.Eastm and west. i wish someone would investigate into the lights


we even have managed to get a few pictures
content.summary: Disc shaped object to the east flashing red, blue green and white lights

content.detailedDescription: I was on my balcony watching the planes go by - they were all very high in the sky going to and coming from midway airport. then a strange plane caught my eye- at first i thought it was a plane then realized it was not. it was headed toward midway airport.It was sort of shaped like a bus- but maybe 2-3 buses in length.I'm not sure if it was a rectangle or cigar shaped ufo.There were about 6-10 extremely bright white lights they were large & round all on the bottom in a straight line. maybe one or 2 lights was square. i saw one light flash once it was red or green and very tiny in the middle��� . it was rather low in the sky only about 1 tree height higher than the 3 story condo i live in and rather close. i saw it between 8-10pm aug 25 or 26 2008. it moved very slow the pace of a blimp. it was a very clear sky at night and very dark -you could see the stars in the sky.��� i called my husband to the balcony to look at it -we are on the top floor -and he said " oh that's a plane". i said well that plane has no wings on it so how it it flying?? he was proccupied with paperwork inside and did not realize what he saw and went back inside. it also made no engine noise or any noise at first for that matter. about a minute later i heard a low motor noise the kind you hear from a dishwasher motor without the water swishing sound. it moved too slow in the sky to be a plane - no plane moves that slow. the lights were so bright and it was such a dark night that i could not see the exact shape of the craft. but the lights were all in one straight line with no wings - i know for sure. and it was close enough for me to see it was not a blimp because i saw no such shape of a blimp on top. i went back inside to find my cell phone to take a picture when i returned it was gone.I was not scared because this is the 2nd time in my life i have seen a ufo. the 1st time i saw one i saw it land on the ground- back in the 1970's in ohio it was the round kind dark metallic slate/gray with 3 round lights one top one red one white and one green. it landed right next to a weeping willow tree and did not move one branch on the tree - at night. it was completely silent. i was studying how airplanes flew back then because i wanted to be a pilot someday. so i knew that was no technology we had anywhere on earth. i felt like it was using magnetic forces of some kind to move - this was just my initial thought when i saw it - i studied a lot of science and that was the first idea that popped into my head as i was wondering how it could be flying. i could be totally wrong - but i��� am just sharing my initial thought at the time. it was there for about 1 minute then flew away. i was scared and very curious - after telling my brother and he said "yea right",i never told anyone else because i did not want people to think i was crazy.
content.summary: Not sure if rectangle or cigar shaped.About 6-10 extremely bright white lights on the bottom.

i wish somone would take us seriously we have seen flashing lights in the skys that dont move until they are ready.Something is going on in this area my brother and sister-in -law and neice  and me have been checking these lights out for over a month they are always to the north,south.Eastm and west. i wish someone would investigate into the lights

content.detailedDescription:
Was at my brothers house he had called me over he said that the lights were out in the sky, so i wemt over there and there where lights with red green or blue and white lights flashing from the north, east, west, and south. so my brother got out his big flashlight  and flashed it off and on the object to the east went crazy you could see all the lights flicker has if it was going crazy.My sister-in-law and i was getting a little scared cause the light would move more light when my brother fladed his ligths off and on

content.detailedDescription:
Starting sept. 26th, i saw this flashing object in the ne of my house.  my dad also saw it.  i watch the sky all the time and have never seen anything like this.  at first i thought it was an airplane since there are lots of planes that go over my house.

it wasn't there sat. the 27th, but was back the 28th and has been there every night since.  it appears to wobble, to move quickly to the right and left, up and down.

sept. 29th, i was watching it and it suddenly flashed off, like someone had turned off a switch!

tonight, oct. 1st, i went out to look (it shows up around 9:30pm every night) and there were 5 of them!

the objects seems to flash white, red and green lights.  i was curious about the object, not shocked because i am sure there are other beings around the planet.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Flashing lights, jerky & wobbly movements, 5 separate light objects

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
It was about 7:10 pm cst and i was about to close the blinds of our bathroom and prepare a bath for my daughter.  the window faces the west and the clouds were parted, so it was a pretty sunset.  i saw the chem trails first (there were about 6-8 of them), then saw a really bright "star".  the "star" was flashing - almost like morse code. the lights would go from the top to bottom, then left and right.  the shape was circular and at times looked as if "small, white sparks" would come off of it as it flashed the white light.  when i initially saw it, it was just still - not moving.  then it went a little to the left, then the right, then left, then right again.  it was flying slowly and looked as if it went through the chem trails.  i lost sight of it when it went into the clouds.  

my initial reaction was interested in what this was and then disbelief (for i just saw a cluster of ufo's in the same area back in may of 2008 and can't believe i'm seeing another one), excited, and a little scared.  i know it was not a plane- there were no red blinking lights nor order of when and where the white lights would flash.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: At sunset, saw 6-8 chem trails, then a ufo.  it was bright (like a star) and was flashing white lights vertically and horizontally.  stood still at times and would move back and forth.

content.detailedDescription: I was just stargazing with my husband, and suddenly i saw something that almost looked like a lcd display in the sky, displaying different symbols, i was freaked out but stayed outside and watched it, suddenly it disseapeared, and everything was normal again. i dont know what it was but i think it had something with the 8.8.08....Idk...
content.summary: I was just freaked out by a strange display of lights

content.detailedDescription:
i was taking a walk at a local school taking pics of sunset late one evening. i took many pics that night  of the sunset at varying degrees of light and cloud cover. i packed up and went home not realizing what i shot. about a month later i finally uploaded the images into my computer. about a week after the upload i was photo shopping my images to post on the web. i came across this image and noted a dark spot near the top. after zooming in i realized it looked like an ufo. at first i thought it would be an airplane. i fully expected to find wings attached to the main image but those never materialized. 

 the first time i noticed the image was when i was uploading pics to the web. upon zooming in i noticed there were no airplane wings attached so i looked again and shouted," holy cr*p, honey!! come here". i asked her what she thought. of course i was or am excited. 

 i always like to second guess myself so i called in my girlfriend for a second opinion. her opinion is that it is a ufo. it does not look like a weather balloon or a plane or anything else. she thinks its a ufo.
content.summary: took pics of sunset and saw object in file

content.detailedDescription: my buddy and i were looking for jupiter at aproximatley 6:30 pm and my buddy found what he thought was jupiter and said it looks strange so i got my 10 inch dobsonian with a 32 mm eyepiece and found what he was looking at, it was moving at a steady speed going from west to east over the sacramento valley area, it had either square or round orbs with a long tether below it. twice in the 15 minutes i watched it dropped smaller orbs that would fall at a steady speed then go at a left angle, i doubled my eye piece which altered the strength to 16mm, and i saw much better detail, deffinatley round red and white orbs flashing. possibley a weather ballon dropping flares but it was awsome to look at through my big telescope!!
content.summary: I watched this object with my 10 inch dobsoinian telescope

content.detailedDescription: I don't smoke inside the house. this was mother's day 2007 around 10:30 am cst. my fiance had to work that day and no one was home except me. i went out on the porch for a smoke. i was sitting in the chair just kind of daydreaming when something shiny in the sky caught my eye. i looked up in the direction where it was moving and at first i thought it was one of those shiny aluminum balloons that you put helium in. i got up and walked out into the yard and i could see that it was moving across the sky really level and not flopping around in the wind like a balloon would. also, there was really no breeze. as it approached my house and got closer i could see that it was round, pitch black on the bottom, with a very mirrored rounded top. the top was so "polished", like a mirror that it was reflecting the sun and you could see reflections in it. it moved slowly closer to my home and as it got closer i could tell it was fairly large. it was really high in the sky either. maybe a few thousand feet. it was quiet, no sound came from it. but it moved slowly, and in a straight line. it never went higher or got lower, just moved slowly and silently across the sky. as it went over the top of my house i remember my heart speeding up and i started to sweat. i wasn't afraid, just couldn't take my eyes off of it. no one else was outside and there was no traffic on my street at that time. it moved over the top of my house, then just kept going. the underneath was as black as oil, and the top polished silver, chrome i guess would be a better word. and i watched it until it was too far away for me to see. i told my fiance, and some family about it, but they don't believe me. but i know what i saw.
content.summary: I was sitting on my porch when i saw the ufo move across the sky....

content.detailedDescription: Call me!
content.summary: Flashing orb communicating with several other flashing and non flashing orbs. in the sky and in the mountian brush, going up and down from the sky to brush.

content.detailedDescription: I was at the blauwtheehuis cafe in the vondelpark (amsterdam) from about 8:30 pm - 11:30 pm.  i was sitting on the outdoor terrace on the 1st floor.  at approx. 9:15-9:30 pm, i happened to notice a circular flying object, with white lights all around its perimeter flying overhead in our direction.  it caught my eye because it was moving pretty fast and it was the only thing in the sky, and i tend to like to look at planes from the ground so i generally look up at the sky a lot being so near a major airport.  it looked pretty small, but i couldn't tell how high up it was, and it eventually flew roughly overhead.  it flew quite quickly, and in a straight line, and i pointed it out to the person i was there with.  i asked him what it was, and he said he didn't know.  i immediately thought it could be a ufo as it definitely didn't look anything like a plane, and i'd never seen anything like it before.  i lost sight of it as it flew overhead and out of sight.  i forgot about the event until just now while at my friend's house when a flashing light outside from a car or something jogged my memory and after i told my friend, she and i decided to google "ufo sighting august 28", and we stumbled upon another report of a sighting from that night in another town in the netherlands (breda), so i couldn't believe it so i thought i'd mention my sighting as well.  i didn't film the event unfortunately and i can't really draw, but it just looked like a perfect circle, dark in the middle with the lights on the outside.
content.summary: Circular flying object with white lights (non flashing) around the perimeter of the object

content.detailedDescription:
09/30/2008 approx 11:00 pm est - greensburg, pa - usa

i was standing on the sidewalk in front of my house when i looked up at the stars.  it was a clear night.  i saw what looked like an aircraft illuminated with flashing red and white (maybe also blue) lights.  the small spec was especially brilliantly illuminated.

i thought nothing of it until the flight path of the object suddenly changed.  it stopped flying in a straight line across the sky.  it moved sharply to the right (as if turning on a dime).  it traveled in a relatively tight circle in a jagged (not smooth) path.  i suspected this was a conventional aircraft in some kind of distress - out of control.  sometimes the object seemed to not be moving at all.  i thought this could be a helicopter but the movements seemed to be too sharp/tight/jagged to be performed by any typical aircraft.

i looked away for a moment. (i went back to my front door, locked the door, then came back to the sidewalk.)  the object had moved further to my right then resumed a straight flying path until it was out of sight.

the path flown by the object did not look at all feasible for conventional aircraft.  rapid, sharp, movements, headed in no particular direction for several minutes, have me suspecting this was not a conventional aircraft.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Looked like civilian aircraft (nighttime but illuminated like aircraft) but movements were not at all conventional

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were out on our balcony smoking a cigarette. we live next to crystal airport and we know the difference from plane and helicopter. we saw a red air craft that zig zagged left to right in and incredible speed. the first movements short, then they became longer distant. i hope someone else saw this also. please contact me. what i saw affected me in a big way.
content.summary: Bright red light zigzagged and zoomed away at very high speed

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way home from and early band practice in houston...Usually we finish at 8:pm...But that evening we quit at 7:30pm. it takes me about 45 minutes to an hour to get home...Depending on traffic. 

as i get about ten minutes from home...I'm at a red light on 249 n at decker prarie road...There are other cars (about 6) waiting as well.

i'm looking at the red light...Waiting for it to turn green...When in the distance ( a mile or so)...I see lights just above the pine trees...Flying low...Going south above the 249 north bound lanes we're on. 

at first glance...To me it was a helicopter in the distance. i turned to look away for a brief second...And when i looked back at the red light...All of a sudden...What i thought was a helicopter...Was all of a sudden much closer (100 yards)...And it is much larger than a helicopter. 
where i'm at, 249 is 3 lanes, this plane...Object...Was about 1 to two lanes bigger on each side than the 3 lanes. so...It's like 5 to 6 lanes wide. 

by this time...It has my full attention (and everyone elses waiting at the red light cause i glanced over at them)...And is looking more like an airplane...With a large wing span...Huge spot lights at the end of each wing (i'm still thinking this is an airplane), it has strobing lights like planes do at the end of what i thought were wings...And flying very very low to the groud...Still flying just above the pine trees. 

i thought it was a plane in trouble...Cause it kept dropping down...And then back up. i took a quick glance at the other cars to see if they were looking at the same thing i was. 

i thought for sure this was a plane in trouble because of the way it was going up an down...Like bouncing in the air. i had my windows down...With no radio on. it seemed odd to me that i wasn't hearing any sound come from the airplane. 

the traffic light turns green...We (traffic) start to cautiously move forward when all of a sudden...It rotates 90 degrees so the lights are now top and bottom...And i thought for sure this plane is going to crash! 

i'm thinking to myself...This is not about to happen...No way! 

brake ligths come on as we all slow down...I stopped completely...Thinking this plane is about to crash right in front of me (us).

once it did the 90 degree manuver...It quickly banked to my right...And flew away from me (us) at an angle. at this point my thoughts immediately went to ufo mode. my reaction was...Is this really happening!!!!
am i really seeing what i'm f'in seeing!!!! 

at this moment...I knew it was not an airplane because of the manuver it did as it flew away...I was able to see the underside and triangular shape with 3 lights...One at each point. it also looked like it had smaller lights in between the big lights. 

i hit the gas hoping to get closer...But as it flew away at an angle...I lost it between the trees. 

i have no doubt that others saw what i saw. you couldn't help but keep an eye on it. no one stopped to discuss...Everyone just went about their business. 

i'm hoping that the others that saw this will report it as well. i was gonna hold off and wait to see if i found something on the internet...But decided to go ahead and report this. 

i did manage to find a couple of pictures that are very similar to what i saw. please see the attached document.
content.summary: Low flying, no sound, strobing light with big bright lights...Triangle shape.

content.detailedDescription:
1. my two friends and i were on top of mt. vaca on mix canyon rd. with my telescope and binoculars to do some star gazing and get a good look at saturn. i don't remember if the moon was out or not. we were on the summit for about a half hour and got spooked by some large animals moving about so we got in the car and drove to the road headed down the mountian. we stopped at a large turn out and i pointed the car up hill so we had a great view of the north western sky through the windshield.
2. my two friends noticed it first and i didn't see it at first. they asked me if stars moved and i told them no, its probably a satilite, they only move in straight lines across the sky. my friend stated that it was moving around oddly in the sky. so i could find it he put his finger on the windshield of the car where the object was in the sky. i watched and then i found the object moving in the sky. it moved from west to east in the sky and did a circular spin like it was descending then going back up then it would go west then east. we watched it do this for twenty minutes. we were so enthralled by what we saw we never thought to use the binoculars between my friend and i in the front seat. my freind in the back seat was with the telescope and he never thought to use it either...
finally it stopped moving and just faded away like it went out into space.
my friends and i weres excited and scared. in retrospect we felt really dumb for not thinking to use the optical tools we had at hand. it was only discussed between the three of us untill now 18 years later.... i learned about mufon on the history channel and looked up the web site and here i am...
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Star like object moving around in sky random then a pattern.

content.detailedDescription:
I was with my girlfriend walking in east-berlin, we had been shopping that day and were going home, we stooped to look at an old building that looked very beautiful and as we where looking up we saw this bright oval shape object flying. at the same time we saw an airplane close by. the ufo speed was ruffly 4 to 5 times faster then the airplane. 

our reaction to this was that i was sure that it must have been something else the ufo, but the speed of the craft was so much that it was not an airplane. 2 weeks after i got on-line to see if anyone else saw something similar in the berlin area, and all the reports and videos were on the same thing.... ;)

t
content.summary: Very bright oval shape ufo in berlin

content.detailedDescription:
I live off holcomb bridge rd in norcross, i was taking my morning walk on tuesday, 9/30 at 8:00 a.M.  as i walked down holcomb bridge toward jimmy carter, i notice a very large dark grayish colored object moving very slow. when i first noticed it i was in the parking lot of the papa johns and blockbuster plaza.  the object was over peachtree ind blvd and jimmy carter overpass heading toward duluth at a very slow speed. there's a lot of tall trees in this area so when it came into my view i was was little taken back and stop right then! i was trying to process the whole thing, was in the heck is that!  
 i notice an airplane fly right over this gray colored object. i waited to the plane went over the object because i wanted to compare the size, the object was massive, huge!  i couldn't believe it! just to make sure i wasn't seeing things, there was a young man walking toward me and i pointed to the sky and asked him "what's that"?  he turned around and looked up and had no idea what it could be!  it moved slow enough that by the time i reach the plaza where the chick-fil-a/i hop and movie theater is off peachtree pkwy (141)i notice it was further up in duluth area but it had sorted stop moving and was sitting just below the right side of the sun! i waited to see if it was going to start moving again, it slowly start moving again north on peachtree ind blvd.  with the tall trees i lost sight of.  i'm sure plenty of people had to see it, in possible not to!  it was too "low" and  moved so slow and with all the traffic on pib, i couldn't have been the only one. i hope other people who saw it would reported it!  thank you!
content.summary: Huge dark  object over  norcross, ga

content.detailedDescription:
I m reporter from diferents newspapers on zacatecas estate, and i normaly take many pictures to have options later to publicate the better quality i goods photos to the internet pages and local newspapers.
 between at 13:50 pm, and 3:30 at date september 30 2008,i take around 20 pictures of the new building  of the police department in tlaltenango city, near to guadalajara city, (2 hours more or less), and two hours of aguascalientes, city,on the south of zacatecas state.
 the police department was making a opening of the new building, and a take the picture on the front of the new place, but i never saw nothing straige on the picture in the moment when i take it.
two hours later, i went to my apartment and i connet my camera  to check all the photos on my lap, the pictures of the past event was for me a normal  routing to checkout, but  i see somethig diferent on just one of my pictures. that���s way i send it to verify this great picture, i never earh any noise or something around, everything was normal, except for the extrange objet on my picture.
i use for my job a dsc h3 sony camera with 8.1 megapixels
thanks.  enrique villegas correa
content.summary: Ufo in the middle of mexico.

content.detailedDescription:
I had a dream about jesus with my 2 dogs laying on my bed and i couldnt fall all the way alseep so we went down into the kitchen to eat some string cheese and i let them out in the back yard.

i let them in and finished my cigarette and saw them both watching me from the kitchen screen door/glass door. i opened the door and the west highland terrior ran under the kitchen table to escape the door opening.

he completely dissappeared and i thought he ran back outside because he is wild and i looked everywhere. so in last attempts i open my parents completely shut door ( he doesnt try to push open closed doors and the knob was in locked position) and he was there laying on his doggie bed. he dissappeared and re-appeared.

so after having a nightmare later at 3 am i went back outside to smoke and saw a neon blue thing 5 times the brightness of the north star hovering in the eastern skies towards chicago and appeared to blink. several mysterious planes were also in the area and the big dipper appeared to be decorated by other star like lights , destroying its pot like shape.

i dont care about the second coming or eternity. at this point i need a new start and  a new body. i dont know why they keep messing with me and i dont think they will ever make me happy without rebirth

good luck kids
content.summary: Youd think i would be excited

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home from school as a kid with my friend. we noticed an object that seemed very high up that was blimp-shaped and white in color. i don't remember what made us look. it was the middle of the day and there wasn't a cloud in the sky. also, there were a couple of what looked to be fighter jets following the object at a distance. this sound of the jets may have been why we looked up to begin with, but i really can't remember. we both watched for a minute or so and agreed we had seen a ufo. neither of us made a big deal out of it, and to be honest i've never really grasped what i may have seen until now. to this day, my friend and i still agree about what we saw. i've never taken the time to officially report it, and i figured i would.
content.summary: White blimp

content.detailedDescription:
In the small hours of september 1, 2008, i was going to my room via the outside landing where it was my habit to look up at the sky as i passed.  i stopped for a moment at the railing and thought to myself, i've looked up at the night sky probably many thousands of times in the last fifteen years, and never seen so much as an unexplainable light.  at the very moment i finished that thought a huge thing flew silently over my head coming from behind me, moving from the east to the west.  as it moved off it appeared to be traveling a bit to the south so that it would have been going south-west toward the ocean.  i knew immediately that it was a ufo.  it was a little overcast with wisps of fog.  only some stars were visible.  the ufo was under the overcast cloud cover, with just a few wisps of fog under it, so its lights were very clear.  it had four small red lights in a perfect square, and between those lights it was pitch black with no stars visible.  it felt big, and solid, and maybe 20'-30' across, but i'm not very good at estimating the size, distance, or speed of anything.  i couldn't make out the shape of the craft because it blended in with the night sky, and it disappeared, or had moved out of view after only about four-seconds.  as it passed over, a circle of larger white lights inside the square created by the red lights came on softly.  they slowly pulsed as if they were on a dimmer, and someone had slowly turned them on and then off.  it moved dead steady, and fairly rapidly.  i tried my hardest to keep sight of it as it moved away, but after only about four-seconds it was just gone.          

i was frozen to the spot, and just kept repeating omg.  i was a little afraid, and i think i stood there for maybe five-minutes.  i went into my room, looked at my clock, and it said 3:50am.  this was the first sighting i've had that i couldn't dismiss as possibly some other thing.  this was a month ago now, and my reactions to this experience in the days that followed were not what i would have thought they would be before this experience.  firstly, although i was a believer intellectually, knowing that something is true on a cellular level is very different.  at least for me.  i was shaken.  i only shared the experience with two people, one of whom has also seen a ufo relatively close by.  i thought i might not report it at all.  i was afraid if others learned about it they would think i was crazy.  i was afraid of being visited by mib.  i had a slight feeling of being "invaded."  i had to sleep with the lights on, etcetera.  i'm feeling better, but i'm realizing that this experience really changes everything that comes after it on some level.
content.summary: Ufo flying about the height of a six-story building.  had four red lights in a square formation bordering a circle of white lights.

content.detailedDescription: Saw the object from the car. it was low, slow moving, going east. i took some photos of it with my camera phone. it looked like it may be a blimp. it was gliding soundlessly. i lost sight of it as i pulled into my destination, as the object became obscured by trees. i tried to look online to see if there were any blimps in the area but i could not find anything.
content.summary: Slow moving object, looked silver, moving east

content.detailedDescription: Around 10 pm, i went outside my friend's residence to smoke a cigarette. i had an uneasy feeling about being outside by myself. i dont recall actually returning inside the residence, but my roommate's fiance remembers me walking back inside but i did not speak to or look at anyone when i came back in.  about an hour later my roommate's fiance found me asleep in the guest room on the couch. she thought that i was crying so she went outside to get my roommate to comeinside and talk to me.  when she went outside she found him wandering towards the edge of the trees.  she had to call his name multiple times to get his attention.  finally he responded and came inside where he found me lying on the couch with my arms extended like i was chained up.  he woke me up and asked me what was wrong.  i explained to him that i had no idea what had happened but that i vividly recalled being on a craft.  i was lying naked on a table, and there was a group of slender, gray-colored figures standing over me.  i remember watching them slice my chest open then a bright light came on over me and two of the entities began speak loudly, almost like shouting, at one another and motioning towards me.  the next thing i remembered was my roommate waking me up.  i explained to him that i was extremely paranoid and uneasy about being alone outside, so he came out to smoke with me.  while we sat outside smoking i looked up and saw a figure crouched on top of the carport.  i pointed the figure out to my roommate and then we began to become very uneasy.  we began to look around the yard and saw more figures around the edge of the trees.  we decided that it was way too risky to be outside, so we went back inside.  right before we entered the house we saw a figure at the end of the fence so we stopped and looked at it, right as we opened the door the figure moved back behind the fence.  while we were outside we called to the figures several times thinking that they may be some neighborhood kids messing around.  not a single one of the figures moved away from us, except for the figure at the fence.
content.summary: There was no siting of a ufo, but my roommate and i both witnessed several entities.

content.detailedDescription: To the ufo faithfuls. every night like clock work a couple of family members and myself go out to watch the skies. the number of orbs differ from night to night. one night 24 high flying orbs and others not so much. so tonight i take the dog for a walk in a field across from  the house. looking up in the sky(south)facing denver i see a high flying orb moving at a high rate of speed. knowing its not a plane because there is no flashing faa lights under or on the sides. also while it(orb) approaches a airplane with red and green flashing faa lights approaches from the west over my location. knowing its not a plane i attempt to contact the craft with a green flash light. as i try morris code, not knowing morris code. the craft slows its flying speed and lights up brighter than any star in the sky. as it slowing down i began to flash the light more rapid. it blinked or flashed at me than dimmed back to its original brightness, picked its speed back up and kept heading north from denver.
content.summary: Orb over thornton,co in an atempt to make contact with like it flashed
